result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Margo L Klein

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
11:14 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L Klein appeared by phone.  Attorney Ryan Kieler appeared by video for Margo L Klein.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Kieler is heard and is ready to proceed with the preliminary hearing. 

1W - Casey Cox, sworn
Exam by Attorney Steiner 
Cross by Attorney Kieler 

State requests matter to be bound over for further proceedings. Attorney Kieler objects to bind over. 
Court finds probable cause and binds matter over for further proceedings. 

Attorney Kieler would like to proceed with an arraignment today, waives reading of the information. Defendant will enter a not guilty plea, clerk will enter a not guilty plea into the record as to each count.
Jury status hearing scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial on December 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury status hearing on December 1, 2022 at 10:30 am.

11:34 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L Klein appeared by phone.  Attorney Ryan Kieler appeared by video for Margo L Klein.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Kieler is heard.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.
on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney - Ct appoints Atty Ryan Kieler

2:18 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L Klein appeared by phone.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant is heard on retaining an attorney.  Court finds the defendant indigent. JA will assign an attorney.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 7, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Per Pub. Def. office today, Def. is still NOT ELIGIBLE for pub. def.  nad

records.addlTxt:
2:31 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L Klein appeared by phone.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant is heard on retaining an attorney. 

2:37 pm brief break for the delivery of the paperwork the defendant dropped in the Clerk of Courts drop box. 
2:38 pm resume. 

Court will continue so defendant can get the public defender paperwork to the courts.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:01 PM Case called - appearances stated. 
Defendant Margo L Klein appeared by video.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court questions def. re: efforts to hire an attorney - response by Def. -does not qualify for P.D., tried to hire an attorney, unable to do so. Will pick up court appointed paperwork tomorrow
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
State Public Defender's Office indicates that Ms. Klein called their office and she does not qualify for a public defender at this time.

1:32 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L Klein appeared by phone.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant is heard on status of retaining an attorney.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:49 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L Klein in court.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.  Right to counsel is explained.
Adjourned for status proceedings scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned for status proceedings on June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Hearing on June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

11:05 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Margo L. Klein appeared by video.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court finds probable cause. 

State is heard on bond.  State requests a $150.00 cash bond.  Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. 

Defendant is heard. 

Court orders a $150.00 cash bond.  Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. 

Court advises right to an attorney.
Hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw.
